name: Helmet Guy
description:
Helmet Guy is a fast-paced and challenging platformer game.  Combine different skills and try not to die while looking for the legendary helmet.

How to play:

Arrow keys - Move/jump
1 - Wear double jump helmet
2 - Wear brick breaker helmet
3 - Wear magic blocks helmet
4 - Wear wall jump helmet
Space - remove helmet

Have fun and good luck!
